data.lyric:
[ti:This Heart is a Stone (Johan Hedberg 4/4 Mix)]
[ar:Acid House Kings]
[al:This Heart is a Stone: Remixes Vol. 1&2]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]This Heart is a Stone (Johan Hedberg 4/4 Mix) - Acid House Kings
[00:00.79]They say your middle name is trouble
[00:03.14]
[00:04.08]But I know it's Caroline
[00:07.27]They say you remind them of problems
[00:09.65]
[00:10.55]But I think you look like Audrey
[00:13.36]Caroline I know
[00:14.86]That you put on a show
[00:16.53]Every time you two disagree
[00:19.95]
[00:21.36]This heart is a stone
[00:23.08]
[00:23.96]They say they can smell the drama
[00:25.90]
[00:27.05]But I know it's No  5
[00:30.27]They say you only bring heartache
[00:32.45]
[00:33.65]But I know you brought a bottle of wine
[00:37.81]
[00:47.72]This heart is a stone
[00:49.49]
[00:50.48]No one will ever break it
[00:53.23]
[00:54.24]This heart is a stone
[00:55.92]
[00:57.01]Close to you it breaks easily
[01:00.11]
[01:01.25]'Cause everything that they say
[01:03.22]Tells me to go away
[01:05.83]
[01:07.83]But everything that I feel
[01:09.81]Tells me to stay
[01:12.23]
[01:14.96]They say your middle name is trouble
[01:17.11]
[01:17.98]But I know it's Caroline
[01:21.15]They say you remind them of problems
[01:23.59]
[01:24.61]But I think you look like Audrey
[01:27.46]Caroline I know
[01:28.82]That you put on a show
[01:30.51]Every time you two disagree
[01:33.86]
[01:35.35]This heart is a stone
[01:37.35]
[01:37.99]They say they can smell the drama
[01:39.89]
[01:41.04]But I know it's No  5
[01:44.23]They say you only bring heartache
[01:46.46]
[01:47.56]But I know you brought a bottle of wine
[01:51.66]They say you're like a Monday morning
[01:54.55]I say you're like a Friday night
[01:57.17]
[01:57.86]I don't get their points
[01:59.53]
[02:00.47]Anytime is a good time for being with you
[02:04.18]
[02:06.62]This heart is a stone
[02:07.91]
[02:09.39]No one will ever break it
